src.utils.index.get_diff_list(lists: tuple(list), _type: str = 'all') → list[fuente]

Get difference between two list

Parámetros

  • lists (tuple) – two list to be compared

  • _type (str, optional) – _type of get diff:

  • different (all - get all list values) –

  • values (right - get only right different) –

  • values –

  • 'all'. (Defaults to) –

Muestra

  • ValueError – Invalid size of lists, expected: __len__ 2

  • ValueError – Invalid _type of lists

Devuelve

difference

Tipo del valor devuelto

list

Search for a file path. :param message: the title of the window :type message: str :param required: if file is required. Defaults to be False. :type required: bool, optional :param types: a sequence of (label, pattern) tuples, Defaults to be ‘*’ wildcard is allowed :type types: tuple|str, optional
